text: @realDonaldTrump Hey @jack @Twitter you block people for expressing hope for harm to others so please block all of @GOP for the harm they keep wishing on Americans, pushing for ideas that will cause millions to die! Harm comes in all ways including their BS handling & speaking on #Covid19!

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
